sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an isosceles triangle.
message_1: A triangle ABC is an isosceles triangle with AB=AC. If the length of the equal sides is 8 cm and the length of the base is 10 cm, what is the length of side AB (or AC)?
message_2: Since the triangle is isosceles with AB = AC, the length of side AB (or AC) is 8 cm.
